text: Hello Team, Could you please provide solution for Reverse Tabnabbing for HubSpot CMS builed website.

Some resources for you:
HubSpot Certification Courses: <https://academy.HubSpot.com>
HubSpot Developers:  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/>
HubSpot Developers YouTube: <https://www.youtube.com/@HubSpotDevelopers/videos>
HubSpot Admin HUG: <https://www.youtube.com/@HubSpotadminhug>

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.

It looks like there is a property on the quotes for the PDF link and PDF generation status:
```hs_pdf_download_link         -  Location to access published quote
hs_pdf_generation_status     -  Status of pdf generation```
These are populated for the published quotes, but not the unpublished ones (see screenshot). So this means that even though they are giving you a preview for the unpublished ones, there must not be a real PDF in the background until you publish it, unfortunately.

I was able to find these properties using the property API  `crm/v3/properties/{objectType}` . {objectType} in this case was `quotes`.

Good luck!

Bringing this up again. where can i direct this message i sent above to get a response and a fix for a bug with HubSpot preview pages. it is happening on every single new husbpot account we create
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1740086335549969>
